summary: Vanilla Hairstyles with horns, no replaces standar hairstyles. Peinados del juego b√°sico con cuernos, no sobreescriben los originales.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/3/668/136003412718438575.gif[/img][/center]

This mod adds versions of vanilla hairstyles with horns. The hairstyles are for both sexes and for all humanoid races (No Argonians and Khajits).

[center][url=http://BannerBreak.com/][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/4/942/136003402443072427.gif[/img][/url][/center]

Is just an esp so you can install it with Nexus mod manager very easy, or another mod manager. This mod will not work without the requirements listed below.

[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/4/884/136003431527753973.gif[/img][/center]

This will be compatible with all mods. If something is wrong just tell me.

[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/5/693/136003435292471225.gif[/img][/center]

This is not an optional section, if you want the horned hairstyles you must install this files:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7403 ]Lovely Hairstyles[/url](Install only the optional file, v0.6)

[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/9/405/136003438750525734.gif[/img][/center]

-No reupload this files to other sites.
-No modify my files without my permission.
-No use my mod in other mods.
-Contact with me if you want to do something like this.
-You can post the link to this mod in forums or wiki's, but remember to not reupload this files.

[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/3/403/136003452868275566.gif[/img][/center]

-V1.0 Initial Release (12/02/2013)

-V1.1 (26/11/2013)
*The mod don't need the Racial Compatibility esp anymore

[center][img]http://bannerbreak.com/banners/3/523/136003441744626470.gif[/img][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31017]A Rich Merchant Mod - Smugglers Lair[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29739]Intensive Dungeons[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31559]Daefling Race[/url]

Credits:

Zn00p for give me permissions (Lovely Hairstyles).
author: Ertos
